desc: We are a local, small batch coffee roaster & cafe where coffee is delicious, food is hand-crafted & relationships drive all we do… if you can’t come sit a spell with us, order online and we’ll send it to you.

layout.text: It's about a whole lot more than just great coffee.
We buy beans from the friends and family of the growers and roast them to perfection right here in our little shop and we give back to those same communities.
